title: Unforgiven
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The 'Schofield Kid'.

title: Reservoir Dogs
description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Scent of a Woman
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: A Few Good Men
description: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: Aladdin
description: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: The Crying Game
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A British soldier kidnapped by the IRA strikes up an unlikely friendship with one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

title: The Player
description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

title: Howards End
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
description: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

title: Malcolm X
description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Chaplin
description: A film about the troubled and controversial life of the master comedy filmmaker Charles Chaplin.

title: My Cousin Vinny
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama call on one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience, to defend them.

title: Wayne's World
description: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

title: Basic Instinct
description: A violent police detective investigates a brutal rock star murder. The prime suspect is a manipulative and seductive novelist who writes about the crime before it happens.

title: Batman Returns
description: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.

title: A River Runs Through It
description: The story of two sons of a stern minister, one reserved and one rebellious, growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

title: Sneakers
description: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: Patriot Games
description: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

title: Sister Act
description: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, the other his worn-out guide, travel through the Great Depression toward a dream.

title: Army of Darkness
description: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

title: Hard Boiled
description: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

title: Braindead
description: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
description: The last seven days in the life of Laura Palmer.

title: Porco Rosso
description: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

title: Baraka
description: A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.

title: Candyman
description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

title: Bad Lieutenant
description: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, addicted to drugs and gambling, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness.

title: Lorenzo's Oil
description: A dedicated couple searches for a cure for their son's rare disease.

title: Passion Fish
description: A paraplegic former soap opera actress returns to her childhood home in Louisiana, where she struggles to adjust to her new life with the help of a nurse.

title: One False Move
description: A small-town police chief awaits a gang of three violent killers who are heading towards his town.

title: Deep Cover
description: A black uniform cop is recruited by a devious DEA agent to infiltrate a drug smuggling organization seeking to expand into designer drugs.

title: Bob Roberts
description: A conservative folk singer turns politician and runs a dirty campaign for the US Senate.

title: Singles
description: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
description: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

title: Death Becomes Her
description: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

title: El Mariachi
description: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

title: Like Water for Chocolate
description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

title: Indochine
description: The story of a French woman and her adopted Indochinese daughter during the last days of the French colonial empire in 1930s Vietnam.

title: Strictly Ballroom
description: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to win the Pan-Pacific Grand Prix Dancing Championship with a new partner.

title: Man Bites Dog
description: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications arise when the film crew loses their objectivity.

title: Orlando
description: Young nobleman Orlando is commanded by Queen Elizabeth I to stay forever young. Miraculously, he does just that. The film follows him as he moves through several centuries of British history, experiencing a variety of lives and relationships along the way, and even changing sex.

title: White Men Can't Jump
description: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
description: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

title: School Ties
description: A Jewish boy goes to an elite prep school in the 1950s and hides his religion until a jealous bigot forces it out in the open.

title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
description: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

title: Far and Away
description: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper.

title: Thunderheart
description: A young FBI agent with a Sioux background is sent to a reservation to solve a murder, but must first come to terms with his heritage.

title: Husbands and Wives
description: When one couple announces that they are separating, the other couple's marriage begins to unravel in a series of confrontations and new romances.

title: Enchanted April
description: Four unhappy women rent a castle in Italy for a month to escape their dreary lives in 1920s London.

title: The Waterdance
description: A writer tries to put his life back together after a hiking accident leaves him paralyzed.

title: Light Sleeper
description: A drug dealer with high-class clientele finds himself in trouble when his boss decides to get out of the business.

title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
description: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

title: Hoffa
description: The story of Teamsters union boss Jimmy Hoffa, his rise to power, and his mysterious disappearance.
